messages.subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Frog Guts
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks so much for posting this.  The whole family had a blast with frogguts.com yesterday.  I was sitting alone here looking at the site, but within minutes I
messages.messageBody:
Thanks so much for posting this. The whole family had a blast with
frogguts.com yesterday. I was sitting alone here looking at the site, but
within minutes I was surrounded by kids and hubby, all saying, "Let me try!"
LOL

Zan

----- Original Message -----
From: Louise Rynkewicz
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, July 24, 2002 2:28 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] unschooling theory


Linda,
for days when there are no obliging lizards I bet he would enjoy
www.froguts.com where he can do a virtual dissection of a frog. My 7yr old
son loved it!
Louise
--
